intro: Experience the fusion of technology and rhythm.

intro: NeuroWave was <ImageVenice>founded</ImageVenice> in 2024, to revolutionize the music industry through <ImageSketchin>AI</ImageSketchin>.
<ImageTCMGTK>Cipher</ImageTCMGTK>, our AI rapper, embodies the future of music creation
Leveraging state-of-the-art AI technologies, we craft unique sounds and performances.
Join us as we shape the next era of music.
clan: A fierce display of lyrical prowess and razor-sharp punchlines. <ImageBW>Battle Born</ImageBW>.
At that time (it was the early 2000s) I began to combine fun for this game and passion for my work, practicing building the first <ImageNO2>Numbers One</ImageNO2> website.

A year later I built a <ImageNO3>web 2.0 portal</ImageNO3> with features such as logins, news, interviews, uploads and sharing of game replays. Visual design with Photoshop, frontend with HTML, CSS and Javascript. Custom backend with PHP Codeigniter and MySql. It still looks like a modern stack.
Today, as then, I enrich my work with constant training, updating, sharing and curiosity.
method:
Creating a successful AI-driven music label involves more than just innovative technology.
The synergy between AI developers and creative artists is key.

Our approach ensures that
NeuroWave remains at the
forefront of AI in music.
If international recognition comes on top of that, it is a greater satisfaction.
